Gas & Pollutant Coverage: CO2; VOC; CO; Nox; PM10; PM25; Sox; BC; OC; CH4; N2O; F-gases
Energy Resource Coverage: biomass; coal; geothermal; hydro; natural gas; nuclear; oil; solar pv; solar thermal; wind
Population Assumptions: Projections come from Mexico's National Population Census (2014)
Emission Factors: US Data from Argonne National Laboratory
